title: Outdoor Fan Motor Failure
description: The customer reports the AC stopped cooling and there was a burning smell from the outdoor unit. Upon arrival, the compressor is running but the condenser fan blade is stationary.
symptoms: Compressor runs but condenser fan doesn't spin
Unit may short cycle on high pressure
Fan blade can be spun freely by hand

faults.description: Condenser fan motor winding is open - motor has burned out

diagnosticSteps.action: Measure voltage at contactor output terminals
diagnosticSteps.hint: Confirms power is available to motors

diagnosticSteps.action: Measure voltage across fan motor terminals L to N
diagnosticSteps.hint: Voltage present but motor not running indicates motor problem

diagnosticSteps.action: With power OFF, test capacitor C to FAN terminals
diagnosticSteps.hint: A weak capacitor can prevent motor starting

diagnosticSteps.action: With power OFF, measure resistance across motor terminals
diagnosticSteps.expectedResult: Should read a few hundred ohms
diagnosticSteps.hint: OL reading indicates open winding - motor is burned out

diagnosticSteps.action: Use clamp meter on motor lead with system running
diagnosticSteps.hint: Zero current with voltage present confirms open winding

learningObjectives: Identify symptoms of a failed condenser fan motor
Understand the consequences of running compressor without condenser fan
Use a clamp meter to verify motor operation
